String.Prompt: There's a shaft nearby, are you sure to go downstairs via this stair?
Config.ShaftPrompter.Title: Enable Shaft Prompter
Config.ShaftPrompter.desc: Ask before trying to go downstairs when there is a shaft on the map.
Config.ShaftIndicator.Title: Show Shaft Indicator
Config.ShaftIndicator.desc: Show an indicator point to the nearest shaft.
Config.StairIndicator.Title: Show Stair Indicator
Config.StairIndicator.desc: Show an indicator point to the nearest stair.
Config.StatueIndicator.Title: Show Calico Statue Indicator
Config.StatueIndicator.desc: Show an indicator point to the calico statue (if any).
Config.IndicatorMinDistance.Title: Indicator Minium Distance
Config.IndicatorMinDistance.desc: Hide the indicator if the distance to the stair/shaft less than this value.
Config.IndicatorScale.Title: Indicator Scale
Config.TextPrompter.Title: Enable Text Prompter
Config.TextPrompter.desc: When discover a stair or shaft, draw text prompts on screen.
Config.TextPositionX.Title: Text X Position
Config.TextPositionX.desc: Set the horizontal position of the prompt text (pixels).
Config.TextPositionY.Title: Text Y Position
Config.TextPositionY.desc: Set the vertical position of the prompt text (pixels).
Config.TextScale.Title: Text Scale
Config.ShowDirection.Title: Show Direction
Config.ShowDirection.desc: Whether to show direction in the prompt.
Config.ShowDistance.Title: Show Distance
Config.ShowDistance.desc: Whether to show distance in the prompt.
Config.ShaftGeneratableIndicator.Title: Enable Shaft Generatable Prompter
Config.ShaftGeneratableIndicator.Desc: Show whether a shaft can be generated (above the text prompt).
String.ShaftGeneratable: Shaft can be generated on current map
String.ShaftNotGeneratable: Shaft cannot be generated on current map
